title: Chris Hayes | Trump and GOP Melt Down Amid Ukraine Scandal, Impeachment: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the president accusing Democrats of treason as Republicans flail in their attempts to defend him from impeachment.

Then, Chris Hayes talks about the crazy news of the past week, the increasing speed of the investigations into Trump's crimes and the high stakes of a 2020 Trump election.
